sen.j: 同社の解散は、同年早々の片岡本人の3か月にわたる病気休養もあったが、大河内伝次郎の日活退社とJ.Oスタヂオ移籍による日活側の要望であった。
sen.e: Although Kataoka was absent due to illness for three months at the beginning of the year, the reason of the company's liquidation was basically Nikkatsu's request, which was made under the situation where Denjiro Okochi resigned from Nikkatsu and joined J. O Studio, rather than his illness.

Rather than Kataoka's absense due to illness for three months at the beginning of the year, Chie Puro was basically liquidated due to a request by Nikkatsu when Denjiro Okochi resigned from Nikkatsu and joined J.O Studio.
